Reviews.Title: Nice little phone
Reviews.Author: John E. Heyer
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for $20 at Walgreen's after my iPhone suddenly decided not to charge.  Activation with NET10 took just 5 minutes and the number worked almost immediately, allowing me to forward calls from my iPhone to this phone for a few days until I got the battery replaced.The phone is small and obviously as low-cost as they come, but doesn't feel 'cheap'.  It also has nice features like a camera and bluetooth, plus the game tetris!  Battery life is great and it can go several days in standby mode or months being turned off.NET10's coverage in the Bay Area and Tahoe was much better than I expected.  I got more bars than T-Mobile and even more than AT&T; in some spots.  One disappointing thing about NET10's prepaid plans is the minutes are only good for 30 days.  T-Mobile minutes are always good for 90 days, so I still like T-Mobile if you only want a cell phone for emergencies. NET10's service does come with a downside though - they 'lock' their SIMs to only work in their phones.  So, if you're thinking you can just pop the SIM out and use it in an unlocked phone, it won't work.All in all, if you want a cheap phone plan and want a small, basic phone, this is a great option.  Worst case scenario you're out $15.

Reviews.Title: Motorola  W408 Pre-paid Cell
Reviews.Author: Jane Austin
Reviews.Content: Bought this phone for husband. He doesn't like anything with small buttons, and has a low frustation level. He likes the camera. He mostly a talker doesn't text much. Was able to port old phone number quickly. It works well for what he needs it  for. Voice mail was quick and easy to set up. The sound is better on this compared to old phone.

Reviews.Title: Missing a serious attribute
Reviews.Author: bigronil
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone thru Net10 along with a Samsung phone for the wife.One serious feature missing on this phone is to delete all incoming and outgoing calls with a single delete button. On this phone all calls have to be deleted individually, very time consuming.The Samsung has a delete button to clear the memory on all calls.I am currently looking for a new phone. I have googled this phone and other users have the same problem and their is nothing in the manual about this problem or a remedy.

Reviews.Title: What a piece of crap
Reviews.Author: Haywood Jablowme
Reviews.Content: The only complaint I had about the Motorola408 is that the battery cover and battery regularly ejected from the phone while in my pocket.  Not just the jeans pocket - also while in a button-up shirt pocket.  It simply fell apart with the greatest of ease.Otherwise, the phone is no more stripped of handy features than any other Net10 phone.  I never had a signal problem until after I smashed it on the concrete when I was fed-up with it after the 1000th time I missed an important call because it fell apart.

Reviews.Title: Just right
Reviews.Author: L. Davis
Reviews.Content: I don't text much so I needed a simple phone that I could use my bluetooth with and was reliable and this phone completely fit the bill.

Reviews.Title: Great value and good service cell phone
Reviews.Author: Annie "Annie"
Reviews.Content: I have been using this brand of cell phone for years and both the service and the product is the best value I have found.  I have also gotten these for my parents and daughter and son-in-law - who are also very happy with them. The phones are easy to use and the Net-10 service has always been a very good value.

Reviews.Title: nice little pocket phone
Reviews.Author: Roadkill Special
Reviews.Content: Good for when all you need is a little cheap phone.  Not a smart phone, nor is it for people that want to impress.  Good enough quality to save me some money now that every thing cost too much.

Reviews.Title: Poor signal
Reviews.Author: adlvm
Reviews.Content: I have used other NET10 phones and this one does not give you any signal when you're inside buildings. On the other hand, it is really affordable and doesn't look bad, but still I wouldn't recommend it.

Reviews.Title: love phone
Reviews.Author: d daniels
Reviews.Content: my son allways wanted this phone has great futures programed into phone ,nice color the price of the phone was great for budget

Reviews.Title: It didnot worked
Reviews.Author: Ebrahim Alzobaidi
Reviews.Content: The phones didn't work because it need subsidy code and you didn't give me the codes when i asked for them

Reviews.Title: Love my red phone!
Reviews.Author: Dorothy D. Dittman "Happy Booker"
Reviews.Content: I named my phone Scarlett. She's a lovely little lady. Reception is great. Everything about the set up was a breeze!

Reviews.Title: Exactly as it looks.
Reviews.Author: Levi
Reviews.Content: What more is there to say other than that it is exactly what I was expecting. Package arrived within 4 days of ordering it. It looked and functioned how it should. Two thumbs up.

Reviews.Title: A decent phone for temporary use!
Reviews.Author: Shela
Reviews.Content: The shipping service is excellent. However, the SIM card came with the phone was invalid so I had to call the (Net10) customer service and spent at least 20 minutes on the phone to confirm my shipping information for them to send me a new card. Since today is Friday, the representative says I won't receive it until next Thursday. So, keep in mind that this item may not be ready-to-go right away.The phone itself is quite decent. At least the keys are easy to use and the setting is flexible so I can avoid mis-pressing the "Browser."Can't make comments regarding the call quality yet, but hopefully, it would be as decent as the phone.

Reviews.Title: this is great my son loves it.
Reviews.Author: Jakeb28
Reviews.Content: I baught this for my son and he loves it he really likes the features of it such as the fm radio and the camera and mp3 player.

Reviews.Title: Trash
Reviews.Author: Me
Reviews.Content: I did not like it at all.It was a big piece of junk.it is made cheap and flimsy.I will never buy that phone again.

Reviews.Title: Hate it
Reviews.Author: wood0921
Reviews.Content: Didnt like the phone it just wasnt what i thought it was otherwise id spent more money and got a higher priced phone.
